aboutusintro.title: About Ganesh Steel
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Engineering, Reliable Solutions
aboutusintro.description: Founded in 1998, Ganesh Steel has established itself as a leading manufacturer of high-quality steel door hinges and stoppers. We combine traditional craftsmanship with modern engineering to deliver reliable, precision-engineered metal components for diverse industrial applications.

items.name: Rajesh Sharma
items.content: Ganesh Steel's door hardware consistently meets our high standards. Their attention to detail and reliable products have been crucial to our project success.

items.name: Amit Patel
items.content: We've partnered with Ganesh Steel for over a decade. Their custom metal components are always precise, durable, and delivered on time.
